file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-51-05-04 - PILOT/COPILOT AUDIO JACKS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PILOT/COPILOT AUDIO JACKS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Pilot/Copilot Audio Jack Panel. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PILOT/COPILOT AUDIO JACK PANEL - ALL 23-51-05-000-801-A REMOVAL PILOT/COPILOT AUDIO JACK PANEL - IN- ALL 23-51-05-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-51-05 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PILOT/COPILOT AUDIO JACK PANEL - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the Pilot/Copilot Audio Jack Panel. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 Cockpit - LH side 224 Cockpit - RH side C. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Soldering Iron To remove the solder and release the wires available D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit, LH and RH sides H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers listed below and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to them: • INTPH 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/INTPH 1). • INTPH 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 2). • INTPH 3 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 3). I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the two dzus fasteners (1). (2) Carefully pull the Pilot/Copilot Audio Jack panel (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-05 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Unsolder the electrical connections. (4) Remove the Pilot/Copilot Audio Jack panel (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-05 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Pilot/Copilot Audio Jack Panel - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A ZONES 223 224 DET. A 2. PILOT AUDIO JACK PANEL 1. DZUS (2) DET. B 1. DZUS (2) 2. PILOT AUDIO DET. B JACK PANEL 1 AIRCRAFT WITH ACTIVE-NOISE-REDUCTION HEADSET 1 EM145AMM230138D.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-05 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. PILOT/COPILOT AUDIO JACK PANEL - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Pilot/Copilot Audio Jack Panel. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 Cockpit - LH side 224 Cockpit - RH side C. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Soldering Iron To solder the wires available D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit, LH and RH sides H. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Solder the wires of the electrical connections (3). (2) Install the Pilot/Copilot Audio Jack Panel (2) in its installation position. (3) Attach the two dzus fasteners (1). I. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers listed below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • INTPH 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/INTPH 1). • INTPH 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-05 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • INTPH 3 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-05 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
